price: 77. Loba: Nkolo wa ngai akomitungisa тропа bino te wana bozangi losambo na bino, mpo bozwaka(ntoma) lokuta, na yango etumbu ekotika bino te, mpe ekozalaka seko na seko.
arabic: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul mā yaʿba-u bikum rabbī lawlā duʿāukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakūnu lizāman
